PageInfo.Message:
The Hunter excels at shooting with a bow, being a
master of long-range attacks. They particularly
demonstrate their skills by aiming for weak points
when facing airborne or large enemies.
<Basic Controls>
- Hold <KC HOLD_BOW> to ready the bow.
- While aiming, press <KC SHOOT> to release an
arrow.
- Press <KC RELOAD> to reload arrows.
- Press <KC ATTACK1> to perform a front kick.

Furthermore, the light blue and blue parts of the
arrow loading gauge indicate the timing for a
"Just Timing".
By pressing the [R] button at that timing, the
"Adept Reload" will activate, reducing the
cooldown time and increasing the power.
Blue (Great!!)
Cooldown reduction, the first arrow splits into 3
Light Blue (Good!)
Cooldown reduction
